website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty bag that offers a proven storage option for a variety of Lipo batteries.
pros: Includes a 2-way zipper that enables you to effortlessly open and close the bag
Hook and loop closure guarantees your Lipo batteries are protected at all times
Fire-retardant outer surface is both durable and strong
Designed to hold a wide range of Lipo batteries
cons: Plastic zipper is cheap and flimsy
Bag is small in comparison to similar options

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for micro batteries
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this for my micro’s so I don’t have to dig for the batteries. I also have the full size bag and I dig it. It’s thick and strong doesn’t feel like it’s going to fall apart carrying heavy lipo’s. This bag is just big enough to carry a handful of tiny whoop batteries, eight 3S batteries, and a fat shark battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great size for Tiny Whoop batteries.
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for me to charge 6 batteries with the charge board inside the bag with spares. Can store the charge board with the AC adapter and 10 1s batteries with room for 10+ more or the Tiny Whoop. If out away from a AC source my 3s 3600mAh has plenty of room too. The material and quality of the bag seem very good. No issues with stitching or the zipper. Zips open/closed easily with the Velcro being pretty strong for such a small but useful fireproof lipo bag.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Manditory safety item
customer_reviews.text: This little bag is perfect for charging my batteries. Its well made and after seeing some youtube fire tests I am confident that this little bag will do it's job if it has to. The bag is a little small but I knew that when I made my order. I only have small batteries at the moment but I'm going ahead and ordering me two more of the larger ones. One for me and one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: John N. Flores

customer_reviews.title: must have item and well built
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3. Two are used simultaneously for charging and the third for storing my Hobymate D6 Duo Pro. All three fit in the larger Hobymate bag for overnight storing. While charging I will set my charger on my workshop table, and insert a 3s 2700mAH battery pack into each mini-bag.
customer_reviews.author: E. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for small to medium (1300mah 3s or so) lipos
customer_reviews.text: It's a good little bag. It's great for 2S to 3S batteries in smaller quantities. The zipper is a little tough to use, but I guess protecting your possessions from spontaneous lipo detonations is a good enough reason to have a tough zipper.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made small lipo battery bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice small lipo battery battery bag. Holds two of my 7.6v 2420 mah proprietary JJRC X5 drone batteries. Well made and will be nice to transport and store my batteries in this nice small bag. Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Magill

customer_reviews.title: Rugged little pouches with great build quality. Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Please with this item. Bought 2 of these to store some small items in a non fireproof safe. Haven't had a fire so I cannot speak to the fireproof-ness of these, but the build quality and construction seems spot on and I love the size. These are rugged little pouches.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyV

customer_reviews.title: Great value charging bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size for my 2s 2200 packs, I could probably fit 4 of them in there. The only think keeping it from being a 5 star review is the zipper is a little stiff and reluctant to turn the corners. This is probably a necessity considering it's a well sealing tight zipper, but still a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydon Bolborn

customer_reviews.title: On the small side !
customer_reviews.text: It's a little on the small side. It would be fine for smaller one or 2 cell batteries. I bought it for 2 cell 1800 Mah batteries. I can really only put one of them in at a time and it's a snug fit. The downside of the bag is the zipper always gets hung up going around the corners of the bag when you seal it. For the money, it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Djwayne

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for small Lipo betteries
customer_reviews.text: A friend and I tested about 30 different brands of Lipo bag and Hobbymate bags did the best. This is a small unit which I use to store my 2-cell batteries. I have three of the larger version for my 3 & 4-cell.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not shabby
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the short lipos. I didnt measure mine beforehand, so it's totally my fault doesn't fit well. That being said, it seems well built, and made of the correct material to keep these volatile batteries from causing harm. So, for the price, it's a decent deal.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for, and at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made and is just what I need. It's a good size for my 2S lipo batteries. Haven't had a battery problem so don't know how it will respond to a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Good small lipo battery bag
customer_reviews.text: This lipo bag is pretty small. It works very well for drone and mini rc batteries. It can probably hold a standard sized pack but it would be snug.
customer_reviews.author: Odessa

customer_reviews.title: Small Lipo Safe bag
customer_reviews.text: well I like the little bag good for my very small batteries time will tell if this product lasts , appears it is made very well and is designed to do what it says...great product
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6 2s shorty batteries for 1/10 scale buggy or mini-truggy
customer_reviews.text: 6 shorty batteries fit perfectly in this, stacked 2 wide and 3 high. Great for storing my batteries when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce_R

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE BAG
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS GREAT LITTLE BAG NOT CHEAP MADE IT IS FIRE PROOF. THANKS (( STORE BATTERYS IN THIS BAG AT ALL THE TIMES ))
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a bigger bag for my 2s 5200mah LiPos, but I didn’t pay attention to the size. It is perfect for all of my 1500mah LiPos though!
customer_reviews.author: mark wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Good bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store and transport my three 2200Ah LiPo batteries... it is perfect. Sturdy, thick material, zipper, and Velcro style closure.
customer_reviews.author: Phil_in_CA

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but kinda small for what I wanted to put. But good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ruru

customer_reviews.title: The hobbymate Lipo charging bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little Lipo bag. I have many Lipo bags I got this one for my small Lipo batteries. My experience with the seller. This is not for you big lipos.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D.

customer_reviews.title: Appears well made
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be well-made. It’s easy to zipper and close with the Velcro. Hopefully I will never have to find out if it’s going to prevent afire from batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Just what it says it is and just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Van Kleyla

customer_reviews.title: Hobbymate fireproof bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. This is a small bag capable of holding multiple 3s lipo batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, easy to carry and store batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag for lipo batteries. Gives me a little peace of mind. No I didn’t torch it or my batteries haven’t exploded, thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Spender

customer_reviews.title: Nice one!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal to keep your lipo batterys safe while charging and storing.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Bag is smaller than you think!
customer_reviews.text: Beware this bag is tiny! Get a ruler and see the dimensions in the picture. Zippers were a bit sticky but otherwise as expected.
customer_reviews.author: CarefulShopper

customer_reviews.title: Cheap insurance for lipos
customer_reviews.text: Great little lipo bag and cheap insurance for smaller lipo batteries. If you fly micros or have a lot of small lipos this is the perfect size for them plenty of room for small 1, 2, 3, and 4s
customer_reviews.author: A-Aronfpv

customer_reviews.title: I figured better safe then sorry
customer_reviews.text: With all the news about batteries blowing up, I figured better safe then sorry ! Great bag ! No problem, no worries!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: one of the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have several brands of safety bags. This one is well made and I like the double closures {zipper and velcro}
customer_reviews.author: George bear

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice, order once.
customer_reviews.text: It's solid, it's compact. Too compact for me, because I didn't read the instructions. fits 3s and below.
customer_reviews.author: GavinC

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Was a little smaller than expected but has great quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.author: James A Batch

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bag is very durable & is a nice quality. Not paper thin and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent lipo bag
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice lipo bag made extremely well. you can feel safe charging any lipo battery in this bag. well worth the money especially if it keeps you from burning down your house
customer_reviews.author: rod squires

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bag is smaller than I expected. But still enough for 4-5 peace lipo battery. Quality is good. Will serve for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Kucukaslan

customer_reviews.title: Great size for mini's
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, great little bag for the mini batteries
customer_reviews.author: JRevereL

customer_reviews.title: Good solid case construction
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have plenty of room for my batteries. Gives me peace of mind when I'm not using them.
customer_reviews.author: joeb

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for my smaller batteries! Super convenient to be able to keep all the different batteries for different quads organized in the field.
customer_reviews.author: NWupperLeft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Perfect size for the smaller lipo batteries. The zipper and Velcro seal well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: If you’re into RC or anything with a Lipo Battery you need this to keep your house from burning.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and has room for several batteries. Glad I bought it because a few years ago my house caught on fire from a battery fire. Must have if you have battery packs.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben b Mcbrayer

customer_reviews.title: Fireproof lipo bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice little bag to carry your lipo’s around thats fireproof
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Rich

customer_reviews.title: Airline approved
customer_reviews.text: Threw my three mavic pro batters in here for my American Airlines flights and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I keep all my LIPO batteries in this bag that fit.
customer_reviews.author: EWMAC

customer_reviews.title: Lipo bag
customer_reviews.text: Was a lot smaller than I thought it was really won't work for me but that's okay
customer_reviews.author: dominic marino

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy finish.
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe bag to store and charge my son's drone Lipo batteries. The zip seems to be waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: fcoj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safe lipo bag, recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality storage battery bag, will buy a few more of them soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and seems very well made! Just the right size for my 1s batteries.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Helpful & handy
customer_reviews.text: Charging and storing lipo batteries in this nice little fireproof bag - safety first! These folks got it here fast and in perfect condition. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it was this small thought it would be bigger
customer_reviews.author: john a

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Well Constructed Tote
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Hope to never test its full capabilities ;)
customer_reviews.author: PRDrop

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Way better quality then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ! Way better quality then I expected. Now let’s hope it never has to go through a test
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best Lipo bags for backpacks.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect! They fit all the battery sizes used for FPV and they fit in your pack. I’ve got four of them. One for each bird!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Amnuaypayoat

customer_reviews.title: Great compact case for Li-Po's!
customer_reviews.text: Fits all the batteries I need and its compact. Very well made and good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: James Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Lipo bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice little Lipo bag. Would trust it with a 6c battery but would work well with a 1c- 3c battery.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Ibubble battery travel case A+
customer_reviews.text: Bought for ibubble underwater camera batteries and the work perfectly!!! Many Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel. Will fit four 4s drone packs and one fatshark battery easy.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: SMALL...
customer_reviews.text: I Wish I Had Ordered a Bigger Lipo Bag... Asside from That it's Great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Taber

customer_reviews.title: Don't by not worth the money unless you have a small battery.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is so small it won't hold a typhoon H battery check out the picture. The H battery is at the top.
customer_reviews.author: bryce knierim

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, store lipo's in it for my drone.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Parks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far works great. Good for all my mini lipos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: These seem well-made. Three v44 batteries (from Voltaic) fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and very nice item. Cheap price to make your hobby safe!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Boily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived perfect. Sorry for the delay in qualifying, is that just arrive at the hotel today. Greetings.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

product_meta.title: Hobbymate Lipo Charging Bag Fireproof, Lipo Battery Safe Bag for Storage & Charging Lipos - Mini Size (110x110x70 mm)
product_meta.description:
Hobbymate Mini Lipo Battery Safe Bag Fireproof for Storage Charging Lipos

+++ With a secure heavy-duty velcro closure and vents to reduce pressure, two way zipper to ensure the bag awway from oxygen to make sure in accident lipo fire to last long time and develop to a huge disaster.
+++ Made of supreme fire retardant fiberglass nylon, both inside film and outer surface
+++ The latest material outer surface was Fire retardant, no glass fiber will annoy anymore
+++ This flame retardant bag is a convenient way of safeguarding your LiPo batteries during charging, transit, and storage.


Protect your home and valuables from a fire due to a Lipo battery failure with HOBBYMATE Lipo-Safe bag. Useful for storage, travel and during charging. The bag has an outer and inner lining made from a woven fire retardant fiberglass material, which helps contain and greatly reduce any fires inside the bag.
Latest fire proof material make sure it works as expected, Two way zipper and Velcro make the lipo bag a complete enclosure from any danger of lipo fires
Not like those cheap lipo bags that may put you in danger even you invest the money with
HOBBYMATE Lipo Bag adapt new material with double side fire proof material, both inside and outside can prevent you from lipo fires, so you have two layers protection for your lipos from fire danger in case there is an accident or when you need to storage the lipos in a safe place
Mini Size: 110*110*70 mm which can load about 6pcs 4 Cells 1400-1600mAh High Rates lipos

Package includes:
1 x Mini Lipo Bag
feature_bullets: With a secure heavy-duty velcro closure and vents to reduce pressure, two way zipper to ensure the bag awway from oxygen to make sure in accident lipo fire to last long time and develop to a huge disaster.
Made of supreme fire retardant fiberglass nylon, both inside film and outer surface
The latest material outer surface was Fire retardant, no glass fiber will annoy anymore
This flame retardant bag is a convenient way of safeguarding your LiPo batteries during charging, transit, and storage.
Mini Size:110*110*70mm,which can load about 6pcs 4 Cells 1400-1600mAh High Rates lipos.
